headline.main: U.S. AIDS DEFENSE OF NEW CALEDONIA; Other Free French Islands in Pacific Also to Get Our Help, Washington Reveals OFFER TO VICHY IS IMPLIED 'Effective Control' Is Test -- Status of Colonial Lands to Be Studied Separately

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 2 -- The United States will cooperate with the Free French forces that are in administrative control of New Caledonia in the Southwest Pacific for the defense of that strategic island as well as other islands in that general area that also are in control of the Free French.
abstract: U S State Dept announces cooperation with Free French on New Caledonia and other Pacific islands defense; text; U S troops believed in New Caledonia; German comment on occupation; map
snippet: WASHINGTON, March 2 -- The United States will cooperate with the Free French forces that are in administrative control of New Caledonia in the Southwest Pacific for the defense of that strategic island as well as other islands in that general area...

byline.original: By BERTRAM D. HULENSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES
